TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonDialogLauncher implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示组上的标准化小图标，可用于打开对话框。

span.span: Represents a small standardized icon on a group that can be used to open a dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 组的右下角显示。 A is displayed in the lower-right corner of a group by default. 在功能区上的组中显示时 ,、和属性不会产生任何效果。The , , and properties have no visible effect when the is displayed in a group on the Ribbon. 但是, 当用户将添加到快速访问工具栏时, 这些属性控制所显示图像的行为。However, when a user adds a to the Quick Access Toolbar, these properties control the behavior of the image that is shown. 此外, 在快速访问工具栏上显示属性时, 该属性不会隐藏。Also, the property does not hide the when it is displayed on the Quick Access Toolbar. 用户可以通过 **功能区 (XML)** 项将添加到快速访问工具栏。The user can add the to the Quick Access Toolbar through the **Ribbon (XML)** item. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview). 仅适用于。 The applies only to a . 对象具有类型的成员。 The object has a member of the type. 有关如何将添加到的信息, 请参阅[如何:向功能区组](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group)添加对话框启动器。For information about how to add a to a , see [How to: Add a Dialog Box Launcher to a Ribbon Group](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group). 您可以通过使用 对象的方法在运行时创建。You can create a at run time by using the method of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class. 此控件的某些属性只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序中之前设置。Some properties of this control can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application. 有关设置这些属性的信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For information about setting these properties, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将添加到功能区组, 以及如何启动一个自定义对话框, 使用户可以在单击 右下角的图标时选择高级设置。The following example shows how to add a to a Ribbon group and how to launch a custom dialog that enables users to choose advanced settings when they click on the icon in the lower right corner of the . 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向 Office 项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 向默认组`Group1`添加[, 如如何: 向功能区组](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group)添加对话框启动器。Add a to the default group `Group1` as outlined in [How to: Add a Dialog Box Launcher to a Ribbon Group](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group). 3. 如果使用 Visual Basic, 请向项目中添加一个新的**对话框**项。If you are using Visual Basic, add a new **Dialog** item to the project. C#如果使用的是, 请添加一个新的**Windows 窗体**项并将其转换为对话框, 方法是向窗体添加 **"确定" 和 "** **取消**" 按钮, 并为按钮的单击事件创建事件处理程序。If you are using C#, add a new **Windows Form** item and turn it into a dialog by adding **OK** and **Cancel** buttons to the form and by creating event handlers for the buttons' click events. 4. 将对话框的 " **(Name)** " 属性设置`advancedSettingsDialog`为。Set the **(Name)** property of the dialog to `advancedSettingsDialog`. 您可以通过添加控件和设置更多属性来自定义该对话框。You can customize the dialog by adding controls and setting more properties. 5. 向代码添加事件处理程序。 Add the event handler to your code. 6. 将以下方法的内容放置到事件处理程序中。Place the contents of the following method into the event handler. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#10](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.Designer.cs#10)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#10](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.Designer.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用此 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this is enabled.
if the is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个图像，在将其添加到快速访问工具栏时，它将在此 上显示。

span.span: Gets or sets an image that appears on this when it is added to the Quick Access Toolbar.

value.span: 一个图像，在将其添加到快速访问工具栏时，它将在此 上显示。

span.span: An image that appears on this when it is added to the Quick Access Toolbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的图像格式为 PNG, 因为 PNG 格式的图像通过其 alpha 通道支持透明度。The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel. 当显示在功能区上的组中时 ,属性不会显示效果。The property has no visible effect when the is displayed in a group on the Ribbon. 但是, 当用户将添加到快速访问工具栏时, 此属性控制显示的图像的行为。However, when a user adds a to the Quick Access Toolbar, this property controls the behavior of the image that is shown. 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. 此属性可在设计时或运行时设置。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时更新此属性, 控件的外观将更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 如果设置了 属性, 则将忽略和属性。 If the property is set, the and properties are ignored. 尽管属性比其他两个属性提供的控件更多, 但它可能会变慢, 因为每次更新控件时, 都会将 image 对象发送到 Office 应用程序。Although the property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标识符，它用于在此 添加到快速访问工具栏时将图像分配给它。

span.span: Gets or sets an identifier that is used to assign an image to this when it is added to the Quick Access Toolbar.

value.span: 一个标识符，它用于在此 添加到快速访问工具栏时将图像分配给它。

span.span: An identifier that is used to assign an image to this when it is added to the Quick Access Toolbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 当显示在功能区上的组中时 ,属性不会显示效果。The property has no visible effect when the is displayed in a group on the Ribbon. 但是, 当用户将添加到快速访问工具栏时, 除非也设置了或属性, 否则此属性控制显示的图像的行为。However, when a user adds a to the Quick Access Toolbar, this property controls the behavior of the image that is shown, unless the or property is also set. 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. Office 应用程序仅从解决方案中检索一次此映像, 以提高性能。The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance. 只能在设计时设置此属性, 因为该属性标识的图像将在事件中加载。This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the event. 当显示功能区时, 每个映像名称只引发一次。 is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed. 之后, 不能使用此属性更改控制图像。After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property. 若要加载图像, 请将代码添加到事件处理程序。To load the image, add code to the event handler. 检查的属性,并将对象的属性设置为要加载的图像。 Check the property of the and set the property of the object to the image that you want to load. 如果设置了属性或属性, 则忽略此属性。This property is ignored if either the property or the property is set. 与属性标识的图像相比, 属性所标识的映像的加载速度要快得多, 因为 Office 应用程序只会在首次显示功能区时从你的解决方案中检索该图像。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed.

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的键盘快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for this .

value.span: 此 的当前键盘快捷键。

span.span: The current keyboard shortcut for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks KeyTip 必须包含1至3个大写字符, 不能包含空格、制表符或换行符。A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. Keytip 有时称为 "访问键" 或 "加速器", 用作激活控件的快捷键组合。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按 ALT 键时, 功能区上将显示键提示。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. 如果 KeyTip 与内置控件或其他外接程序的 keytip 发生冲突, Microsoft Office 可能会自动分配不冲突的 KeyTip 值。If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[使用键盘处理功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523).

summary.span: 如果要使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置要在此 上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display on this , if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.

value.span: Microsoft Office 图标的 ID，该图标将在此 上显示。

span.span: The ID of the Microsoft Office icon to display on this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识控件显示的 Office 图标。The property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control. 属性值是标识`imageMso`所选图标的值的字符串。The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon. 此属性可在设计时或运行时设置。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时更新此属性, 控件的外观将更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 有关`imageMso`值的列表, 请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页面[Office 2010 外接程序:图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760). 如果设置了属性, 则忽略此属性。This property is ignored if the property is set. 由于图像缓存在 Office 应用程序中, 因此可以比属性标识的图像稍快地加载属性标识的图像。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the images are cached in the Office application.

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，此 是其成员。

span.span: Gets a object of which this is a member.

value.span: 一个 对象，此 是其成员。

span.span: A object of which this is a member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在功能区加载到 Microsoft Office 应用程序之前, 可以在设计时或在运行时添加到。You can add a to a at design time, or at run time before the Ribbon is loaded into the Microsoft Office application. 因此, 在加载功能区后, 属性将不会更改。Therefore, the property will not change after the Ribbon is loaded. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResumeLayout() cil managed

span.span: Reverses the effect of the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次调用时, 内部计数器都会递增。Every time is called, an internal counter is incremented. 减少此同一个计数器。 decrements this same counter. 如果此内部计数器等于零, 则 Microsoft Office 重绘控件。When this internal counter becomes equal to zero, Microsoft Office redraws the control.

span.span: Gets the on which this is placed.
The on which this is placed.

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到 上方时显示的提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the .

value.span: 用户将指针移到控件上方时显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值的长度必须小于1024个字符。The value must be less than 1024 characters in length. 设置属性时 , 值显示为的标题。 When the property is set, the value appears as the title of the .

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到 上时显示的多行提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the .

value.span: 包含多行提示文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains multiline tip text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串的长度必须小于1024个字符。The string must be less than 1024 characters in length. 显示在 " 文本" 下。The appears under text. 与不同的是 , 会在字符串中启用分行符。Unlike the , the enables line breaks in the string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SuspendLayout() cil managed

summary.span: 阻止 Microsoft Office 应用程序刷新 中的控件状态。

span.span: Prevents the Microsoft Office application from refreshing the state of controls in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你的应用程序有许多频繁更新的控件, 则调用可能会导致性能稍微提高。Calling might result in a slight performance increase if your application has many controls that are frequently updated. 更改每个控件的状态后, 可以调用来允许刷新 UI。After you change the state of each control, you can call to allow the UI to be refreshed. 每次调用时, 内部计数器都会递增。Every time is called, an internal counter is incremented. 减少此同一个计数器。 decrements this same counter. 如果此内部计数器等于零, 则 Microsoft Office 重绘控件。When this internal counter becomes equal to zero, Microsoft Office redraws the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this is visible.

value.span: 如果 可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is visible; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 组的右下角显示。 A is displayed in the lower-right corner of a group by default. 当处于此默认位置时 , 属性将确定此是否可见。 When a is in this default position, the property determines whether this is visible. 但是, 在快速访问工具栏上显示时, 属性不起作用。However, the property has no effect when the is displayed on the Quick Access Toolbar. 例如, 如果快速访问工具栏和所属的组都可见, 则将属性设置为`false`将导致组中的出现消失, 但在快速访问工具栏上将保持可见。For example, if both the Quick Access Toolbar and the group to which the belongs are visible, then setting the property to `false` will cause the on the group to disappear, but the one on the Quick Access Toolbar will remain visible. 此外, 将属性设置为`false`不会影响是否启用了快速访问工具栏上的。In addition, setting the property to `false` does not affect whether the on the Quick Access Toolbar is enabled. 若要禁用它, 请将其`false`属性设置为。To disable it, set its property to `false`.
